summary: President Trump’s Official Sneaker - President Trump is launching a limited edition sneaker collection with only 1000 pairs available. Each pair is numbered, and some are autographed by Trump. The sneakers are priced at $399 for pre-order. Additionally, there are fragrances available for purchase. Customers can get a 5% discount on their entire order by buying 2 items or more. The sneakers come with exclusive Trump superhero charms and an invitation to the official Trump sneaker launch party. The products are not for investment purposes but for individual enjoyment and collecting.
